message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my understanding of the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking to receive while also staying within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1150000. I believe this is a fair price that balances our interests. What do you think?

I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1125000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable and moves us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $1125000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $1125500. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. What do you think?

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1124000 for the product. This price reflects both the value of the product and my financial constraints. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1124000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1126000. I believe this is a fair price that balances our interests. What do you think?

I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After reviewing the situation once more, I would like to propose a price of $1125000 for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between the value of the product and my budget constraints. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1125000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1127000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. What do you think?

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $1126000 for the product. This price reflects both the value of the product and my financial constraints. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
